title: Skytree
description: Skytree is a carbon tech company. Our Ersa product enables better battery efficiency and air quality in electric vehicles. We are a direct air capture company that believes in the power of practical, scalable, every-day products that will create a positive ripple effect in tackling the climate emergency.  Ersa, our inaugural product for the electric car, protects the driver and passengers from harmful pollutants while enabling a 40% increase in HVAC efficiency.
